discrepancies.finding: Bill of Lading does not indicate the port of loading stated in the credit
Bill of Lading contains the indication 'intended vessel' or similar qualification in relation to the name of the vessel
Bill of Lading does not contain an on board notation indicating the date of shipment and the name of the vessel

compliances.finding: Bill of Lading indicates shipment from the port of loading to the port of discharge stated in the credit
Bill of Lading is the sole original or if issued in more than one original, it is the full set as indicated on the bill of lading
Bill of Lading contains terms and conditions of carriage or makes reference to another source containing the terms and conditions of carriage
